article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

From summertime fun for the family to volunteer opportunities, there's something for everyone on this Inside KELOLAND.

All it takes a few hours a month to have a lasting impact on a child. We look at the many benefits of Big Brothers Big Sisters and how you can get involved.

We also take a look at all of the summer activities at the Outdoor Campus, and we'll tell you about a camp of a different kind at the Brennan Rock & Roll Academy.

That's Sunday night after KELOLAND Weekend News at 10.

article_summary:
Sioux Falls, SDFrom summertime fun for the family to volunteer opportunities, there's something for everyone on this Inside KELOLAND.
We also take a look at all of the summer activities at the Outdoor Campus, and we'll tell you about a camp of a different kind at the Brennan Rock & Roll Academy.
We look at the many benefits of Big Brothers Big Sisters and how you can get involved.
All it takes a few hours a month to have a lasting impact on a child.
That's Sunday night after KELOLAND Weekend News at 10.
